title: Build Azad Nexus Global Rice Export Business Website with Admin Panel

requirements.text: Build a full public-facing business website for 'Azad Nexus Global', a rice export company that exports rice from India to other countries. The site must include the following pages: Home (hero section highlighting rice exports from India, key stats, CTAs), About (company story, mission, expertise in Indian rice exports), Services (types of rice exported, quality standards, export process), Blog (list of articles/news about the rice export industry), and Contact (inquiry form for potential buyers and partners with fields for name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, and message).

quotes: Export we export rice from India to others countries.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders with a hero section, key highlights about rice exports, and CTA buttons
About page describes the company, its mission, and expertise in exporting rice from India
Services page lists types of rice exported, quality standards, and the export process
Blog page displays a list of blog posts (fetched from backend)
Contact page includes a form with fields: name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, message and submits successfully to the backend
Navigation links work correctly between all pages
Footer displays company contact details and social links

requirements.text: Implement a secure admin panel login system using username and password. Admin credentials (username: azadnexus.global@gmail.com, password: Karusu_7) must be stored securely in the backend (hashed, not plaintext). The admin panel must be accessible only after successful login with these credentials. Show an 'Access Denied' page for unauthenticated access attempts with a link back to the public site.

quotes: Ok we will access the admin panel dashboard with username and password
Username is azadnexus.global@gmail.com and password is Karusu_7

acceptanceCriteria: Admin login page renders at /admin with username and password fields
Submitting correct credentials grants access to the admin dashboard
Submitting incorrect credentials shows an error message
Credentials are stored securely (hashed) in the backend
Unauthenticated access to admin routes redirects to the login page or shows Access Denied
Admin can sign out and is returned to the public website

requirements.text: Build an admin dashboard that allows the admin to view and manage all contact form inquiry submissions. The dashboard must display inquiries in a table with columns for name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, message, and submission timestamp. Admin must be able to delete individual inquiries.

quotes: yeah all managing inquires contact form submission

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard shows a table of all submitted inquiries
Table columns include: name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, message, timestamp
Admin can delete an individual inquiry
Inquiry list updates after deletion without requiring a page reload
Empty state is shown when no inquiries exist

requirements.text: Build a blog post management feature in the admin panel. The admin must be able to create new blog posts (title, content, optional image description, published date), edit existing blog posts, and delete blog posts. Published blog posts must appear on the public Blog page.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel includes a 'Blog Posts' section listing all posts
Admin can create a new blog post with title, content, and published date
Admin can edit any existing blog post
Admin can delete any blog post
Published blog posts appear on the public /blog page
Blog posts are persisted in the backend

requirements.text: Build a services management feature in the admin panel. The admin must be able to edit existing service listings (name, description, details). Changes made in the admin panel must be reflected on the public Services page.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel includes a 'Services' section listing all services
Admin can edit service name, description, and details
Changes saved by admin are immediately reflected on the public Services page
Services data is persisted in the backend

requirements.text: Apply a premium, professional visual theme across the entire public website consistent with a high-quality Indian rice export brand. Use a warm, elegant color palette (deep greens, golds, creams) evoking quality grain and agricultural excellence. Use clean, modern typography and a layout that communicates trust, professionalism, and global reach. Apply the theme consistently across all pages including navigation, footer, cards, buttons, and forms.

quotes: Export we export rice from India to others countries.

acceptanceCriteria: All pages use a consistent color palette (warm greens, golds, creams)
Typography is clean and professional throughout
Navigation, footer, cards, and buttons all follow the same visual theme
The design communicates trust and global professionalism appropriate for a B2B export business

constraints: Admin credentials (azadnexus.global@gmail.com / Karusu_7) must be stored securely in the backend — hashed, never in plaintext
Do not use Internet Identity for admin authentication — use username/password login only
All Motoko logic must remain in the single backend/main.mo actor
nonGoals: Third-party email delivery for inquiry notifications
